## Setup

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse) 
library(readxl) 

orders <- read_excel("data/orders_data_set.xlsx")
```

## Summarize

```{r}
orders %>%
  select(order_id, patient_id) %>%
  head(4) %>%
	summarize(order_count = n(),
	          pt_count    = n_distinct(patient_id)) 
```

## group_by

```{r}
orders %>% 
  group_by(patient_id, department) %>%
  head(4)
```

## group_by %>% summarize

```{r}
orders %>%
	group_by(patient_id) %>%
	summarize(order_count = n()) %>%
	summarize(pt_order_count_mean = mean(order_count))
```
